shared.model.cards

Class Bank

  • java.lang.Object
    • shared.model.cards.Bank

  • public class Bank
extends java.lang.Object
    Manages the administration of game resources (cards, buildings, etc.)
    Author:
    thyer

    • Method Detail

      • buyDevCard

        public DevCard buyDevCard(User purchaser)
        Removes the necessary ResourceCards from the player's hand and returns a randomly drawn DevCard Throws an exception if canBuyDevCard returns false
        Parameters:
        purchaser - the Player buying the DevCard
        Returns:
        a randomly drawn DevCard pulled from the deck

      • canBuyDevCard

        public boolean canBuyDevCard(User purchaser)
        Checks to see if a purchase is possible for that player
        Parameters:
        purchaser - the Player buying the DevCard
        Returns:
        true if possible, false if impossible

      • drawDevCard

        private DevCard drawDevCard()
        Draws the top card from the DevCardDeck
        Returns:
        the top card from the deck

      • getResourceCard

        public ResourceCard getResourceCard(ResourceCard type)
        Checks if there are remaining ResourceCards of that type remaining, draws one from the deck if available Throws an exception if not available
        Parameters:
        type - a ResourceCard with the enumeration attribute of the desired card to be returned
        Returns:
        the desired ResourceCard if available

      • canDrawResourceCard

        public boolean canDrawResourceCard(ResourceCard type)
        Checks to see if the desiredResourceCard can be drawn
        Parameters:
        type - a ResourceCard with the enumeration attribute of the desired card to be returned
        Returns:
        true if possible, false if impossible

      • shuffleDevCardDeck

        public void shuffleDevCardDeck()
        randomizes the order of cards in the DevCardDeck

      • giveCardToUser

        public void giveCardToUser(User player,
                  Card card)
        Awards the specified card to the specified Player
        Parameters:
        player - the Player to be awarded a card
        card - the Card that the user is being given

      • givePieceToUser

        public void givePieceToUser(User player,
                   Piece piece)
        Awards the specified piece to the user
        Parameters:
        player - the Player to be awarded a piece
        piece - the Piece that the user is being given

      • canPieceBeAwarded

        public boolean canPieceBeAwarded(User player,
                        PieceType type)
        Determines whether the given User can purchase the given Piece
        Parameters:
        player - the player attempting to purchase a piece
        type - the type of Piece desired
        Returns:
        false if the User has insufficient resource cards or the Piece cannot otherwise be awarded
